text: Antonblast (stylized all capital letters) is a 2024 platform game developed and published by Summitsphere. == Gameplay == Antonblast is an action- platformer. The Player takes control with Dynamite Anton or Dynamate Annie, as they rampage through many areas populated by Satan's minions to take Anton's stolen spirits. Brulo's Casino acts like the hub world of the game they access different levels.https://web.archive.org/web/20241209230938/https://nintendowire.com/reviews/antonblast/ == Refefences == Category:2024 video games Category:Video games set in hell Category:Windows games Category:Indie video games Category:Nintendo Switch games
title: Antonblast
